title: Pixel 3 can't connect to Chromecast after Android 10 update
content:
Hi,

Since updating my Pixel 3 to Android 10, I can no longer cast to my Chromecast 1. However, my Pixel which is still using Android 9 is able to connect and cast. I can also cast from my Home Hub once I add the Chromecast to my Home group on my Pixel (Android 9).

My Pixel 3 can find the Chromecast, but when I try adding it to my Home group I get an error. It suggests AP isolation may be on and that I should turn it off. However, as the other devices work fine I doubt that's the issue here.

The problem seems to be with Android 10. I could cast fine before the update and every other device is still able to do so. Hence, I don't believe anything is wrong with the wifi/network settings of my router or my other devices.

Does anyone know how to solve this?
